pages.text: The healing of passive creatures and players is increased while in they remain in the ritual range.$(br2)Indeed, those passive creatures healed by the ritual are healed for significantly more, and also more frequently, than players.$(br2)$(info) Hostile creatures are unaffected by the ritual.

pages.title: Ritual Specifics
pages.text: $(bold)Duration:$() The ritual lasts $(ritual:healing_aura/SECONDS/duration) seconds. If an inactive grove stone is not found nearby by the end of the ritual, it will fail.$(br2)$(bold)Size:$() The ritual will search for grove stones within an area of $(ritual:healing_aura/radius_x) and $(ritual:healing_aura/radius_z) blocks horizontally, and by $(ritual:healing_aura/radius_y) vertically.
